comment.body: there's not a link to your sculpture... I've made some textile "objects" with trash: on the beach http://127.0.0.1:43110/15Aj7PkCPHfCHqNFUnEMoKBDwqHAJ7b9Q6/TelaioDAmare.html ; and other distributed in Milan http://127.0.0.1:43110/15Aj7PkCPHfCHqNFUnEMoKBDwqHAJ7b9Q6/FsC.html http://127.0.0.1:43110/15Aj7PkCPHfCHqNFUnEMoKBDwqHAJ7b9Q6/AS.html
not bad, but I would prefer your personal photos
@Colkurtz: not bad, but I would prefer your personal photos

in [ZeroMePlus](/1Lj1oPcN7oZQL8HkS5KbkzQuKqs42zQWY6/) you already have the **search** function and also a selection of "*your posts, posts where you commented, posts where you're mentioned and followed users' posts*"... and #tags

- [N0blogs](/1MyrB3bQfCr67H6GTxdcFbqdfUN1sFNPwT/) - Site Wide Activity
- [Fluss0](/1Lvn7oyTATpCxjtJRcCKACWvbDqAiGkfGX/) - Aggregatore di notizie

In my ZeroMe profile there're other minor aggregators

@Quantumworld: N0blogs is a multilanguage aggregator (a lot of blogs) from **Noblogs.org** - *Connecting radical people. Non commercial, antifascist, antisexist, privacy-oriented blog platform.*

see https://noblogs.org/

@Quantumworld: I'm sorry, I've make a mistake, I think you should be interested on FeedBot-ZeroBlog, or FeedBot-ZeroTalk

on [Binchan's messy repo](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/?13zzNGxEXDeLxHEGZdG3mE7G8dChf45LrV)

@Klu9: I've replied to @Quantumworld

you can look at [Binchan's messy repo](/1GitLiXB6t5r8vuU2zC6a8GYj9ME6HMQ4t/repo/?13zzNGxEXDeLxHEGZdG3mE7G8dChf45LrV)

@Klu9: in the script (*feedbot.py*) there're these two lines
```
entry_summary = entry_summary[0:300] + '...'
entry_summary = entry_summary.replace('![', ' [IMG ')  # Change Image to url
```

the first is for limit the summary (300 characters), then, if you change that limit you can have long summaries

the second to change imgs to urls; if you comment that line with '#' you can publish images

@Klu9: thanks,
I've rebuilded the Fluss0's database, now it should be full of posts
@Quantumworld: I don't know, I've realized that sometimes, after feeds update, I need to update database, otherwise news don't appear
